name: Sample Amusement Park "Building"
description: A type of small tent within the Veluriyam Mirage's Pavilion of Hermits, using an appearance heavily influenced by Sumeru's architecture.\nAccording to legend, the earliest of these were originally built by Hydro Eidolons. Idyia spared no effort in teaching Hydro Eidolons how to make wooden fixtures and create frames. Fortunately, Hydro Eidolons are quite intelligent, and quickly learned the tricks of the trade, and became competent helpers...
